actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a postage stamp to commemorate the two hundredth anniversary of the birth of Martin Van Buren, the eighth President of the United States, at Kinderhook, New York on December 5, 1782.

summary.text: Directs the Postmaster General to issue a commemorative postage stamp to honor the 200th birthday of Martin Van Buren, the eighth President. Requires that such stamp be first placed on sale on December 6, 1982, at Kinderhook, New York, the former President's birthplace.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a postage stamp to commemorate the two hundredth anniversary of the birth of Martin Van Buren, the eighth President of the United States, at Kinderhook, New York on December 5, 1782.
